Werewolves In The Park!?.name: Werewolves In The Park!?
Werewolves In The Park!?.blurb: Eye witnesses have reported a number of delinquent teenagers transforming into rabid beasts before their very eyes! This is a very serious matter that we will be raising at the next city council meeting.

Museum Robbery.name: Museum Robbery
Museum Robbery.blurb: At 1 AM, the museum was broken into and a number of artifacts were stolen. Interestingly, the artifacts taken were not the traditionally valuable ones. Leads can be submitted to Inspector XYZ for rewards.
